arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Referee appointed for Matchday 12
arts.sum: This Sunday, as part of Matchday 12 of the 2025–2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Olympique Lyonnais (8th) at the Groupama Stadium (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). The referee for the match has been appointed: Benoît Bastien (39 years old), a highly experienced official with 264 Ligue 1 matches to his name. […]
